title: What To Do with Apple's $999 Pro Stand (without Pro Display XDR) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: What To Do with Apple's $999 Pro Stand (without Pro Display XDR) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: You can use Apple's Pro Stand to fit in with the Mac Pro crowd! Just because you don't have the Pro Display XDR, or a Mac Pro, doesn't mean you have to suffer Mac Pro FOMO (fear of missing out).
